revised_title: A Review of Curious Books and Collections from the Journal des Scavans
tldr: The author provides an account of various books and collections mentioned in the Journal des Scavans, including the Museo Cospiano, the Library of the Parisian College of the Society of Jesus, and a glossary by Garolo du Fresue. The article also discusses the Explication Novelle & Machanique des Actions Animales, a work on animal functions and the construction of the brain.
